name: Dune Climbers - Escape From The Haboob
name_original: Dune Climbers - Escape From The Haboob
description:
Can you escape from the Haboob?

In this game you have to race against time to get to the finish.

Along the way you can find power-ups, perform insane stunts and generally drive at breakneck speeds across the dunes! Talk about fun!

You also get to unlock some beautiful circuits and vehicles. We guarantee there is something for everyone here! Collect coins to pay for it all!

Or if you can’t wait, unlock everything quickly in the Dune Climbers online store!

But wait... There is more!

How about multiplayer action! Yes you can play against your friends, family and even with a match making system to play against someone else online!

Challenge for the best score and fastest time!

Download Dune Climbers - Escape From The Haboob today!
